message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing and summarization. It could also belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as it involves query-focused summarization. The paper also incorporates Bayesian topic models, which are commonly used in machine learning and could place it in the sub-categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper uses supervised learning methods, which could place it in the sub-category of cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
